statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{2 \, x - 2 , 5 \, x^{3} - 6 \, x^{2} + 4 \, x + 2 , 10 \, x^{3} + 32 \, x^{2} - 3 \, x + 21 , -4 \, x^{3} - 4 \, x^{2} - x - 5 , 3 \, x^{3} + 14 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 8\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
